name: Shituation Out of Control
description:
Billy thought taking care of an alien dog would be a walk in the park... But oh no! During an otherwise peaceful trip to the local park, Billy's alien dog goes OUT OF CONTROL!!! Clean up the mess before the parkgoers get too angry with your dog.

  • Poop have to be taken to the trashcans, you can carry two at a time.
  • Heal wounded dogs after your dog knocked it out in a fight.
  • When your dog shags a female, a puppy will pop out. Pick it up and throw it at a fight to break it up before anyone gets hurt. 
  • Fire hydrants will get destroyed by your dog's powerful pee, fix these before someone calls the fire department.

Move with WASD. Interact with E.
